snippet: Robert Koehler, who last fall was named year-round director of programming at the Film Society of Lincoln Center, is resigning that position, to be replaced by Dennis Lim.
abstract: Robert Koehler, who last fall was named year-round director of programming at the Film Society of Lincoln Center, is resigning that position, to be replaced by Dennis Lim.

headline.main: New Programmer at Film Society Steps Down; Replacement Named
headline.print_headline: Programmer Steps Down At Film Society
